title: All-Inclusive Island Getaway in the Philippines
description: Venture to the north-west tip of El Nido province, one of the Philippines' most popular destinations, to find your own slice of tropical paradise at El Nido Resort Lagen Island. Unwind in luxury in this secluded resort, nestled between the lush forest and a calm, shallow lagoon where you will receive the full VIP treatment with all-inclusive meals, a bottle of wine on arrival, an island hopping tour, complimentary use of non-motorised water-sport equipment and convenient return airport transfers.
offer_address: Lagen Island, El Nido, Palawan Island 1229, Philippines 1229 Philippines

title: Secluded Philippines Island Luxury Oasis with Onsite Spa & Restaurants
description: Find luxury in simplicity at Lihim Resorts, hidden in the verdant forest coastline of one of the Philippines’ most tranquil islands, El Nido. The property is secluded and incredibly opulent, boasting breathtaking vistas from the craggy mountains to the sparkling sea. Slip even further into relaxation with a tailored treatment at the Panari Spa or a dip in the infinity pool. Indulge in rooftop cocktails at Henri’s or delectable dishes at Gana Restaurant while basking in postcard-worthy views.
offer_address: 999 Sitio Caalan, Brgy. Masagana, El Nido, Palawan 5313, Philippines
